User Management

This helps you to manage users and their roles and responsibilities. This menu is made available only to Admin and Super Admin

Figure 9-2 Menu Options for Admin

Table 9-2 Users and roles

Users

Roles and Responsibility

Super Admin

Super admin has rights to add admin users and normal users to access the portal.

Admin

Admin user has rights to add normal users to access the portal.

Users

User has rights to use the portal

To provide access to new user

Enter the User ID, select the Role of the user and then click Add

Figure 9-3 User Management
